pages.text: A ship all about mutually assured destruction.
Target an opponent tile. The next turn the ship fires a nuclear missile at it, insta-killing anything in a 5x5 area.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: Only triggers if you've used your active ability. The ship's core overloads, violently detonating and insta-killing anything adjacent to the ship. Shrapnell will damage an additional 5 of your tiles at random.
